subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Fouls, commercials and timeouts can prolong games like the one May 4 between the Nets and the Raptors, in which the final 60 ticks of the clock took nearly 18 minutes.
snippet: Fouls, commercials and timeouts can prolong games like the one May 4 between the Nets and the Raptors, in which the final 60 ticks of the clock took nearly 18 minutes.
